body:
Depends on the ldc package (#5279) that alalazo's working on.

It requires a patch to the Makefile because one of ldc's library functions mentions dlopen.  I *think* that ldc should be handling this.  See the discusssion in #5279.

It also requires a "static" ldc.  Again, see #5279.

Finally, it needs "undeaD" as a resource, but I'm guessing at the appropriate release.  See lomereiter/sambamba#312.

Also need to investigate whether it requires `parallel=False` (`spack create` added that...).
title: Sambamba new package
